com.okta.scim.util.model
Class SCIMGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.okta.scim.util.model.SCIMResource
      com.okta.scim.util.model.SCIMGroup

public class SCIMGroup
extends SCIMResource

A wrapper over the UnboundID representation of the SCIM group.

SCIMGroup has two properties:

  1. GroupResource, an UnboundID representation of the standard properties of SCIMGroup, is used to set and get all the standard properties of SCIMGroup. The standard properties of SCIMGroup which are converted to and from Okta AppGroup are displayName, id (Converted to/from the externalId of the Okta AppGroup), and the group memberships.

    This is how you can set the standard properties of SCIMGroup:

    1. SCIMGroup group = new SCIMGroup(); //Create an empty group
    2. GroupResource stdGroup = user.getStandardGroup(); //Get the empty standard group out of the SCIM group
    3. stdGroup.setDisplayName("someValue"); //Set the display name
    4. stdGroup.setId("someOtherValue"); //Set the Id
    5. Collection> groupMemberships = new ArrayList>(); //Create the collection for group members, detailed below. 
          Entry member = new Entry("101", null); //Create a member entry for a user whose ID is 101.
    member.setDisplay("someValue"); //Set the userName for that user member as the display.
    groupMemberships.add(member); //Add the member
    6. stdGroup.setMembers(groupMemberships); //Set the members to the standard group
    7. group.setStandardGroup(stdGroup); //Finally, set the standard group to the SCIMGroup

    Similary, get these properties from a SCIMGroup, as follows: 

        String displayName = group.getStandardGroup().getDisplayName();
    Entry firstMember = group.getStandardGroup().getMembers().get(0);
  2. Custom Properties

    Currently, only one custom property (description) is supported for an AppGroup. Note that the custom namespace for the Group is a constant and is not dependent on the appName. Get/Set the description of the AppGroup - 

     group.setCustomStringValue(SCIMOktaConstants.APPGROUP_OKTA_CUSTOM_SCHEMA_URN, SCIMOktaConstants.OKTA_APPGROUP_DESCRIPTION, "Group Description"); //Set the value
 String description = group.getCustomStringValue(SCIMOktaConstants.APPGROUP_OKTA_CUSTOM_SCHEMA_URN, SCIMOktaConstants.OKTA_APPGROUP_DESCRIPTION); //Get the value

To understand more about the UnboundID SDK and how to work with the SCIMUser.standardUser, the UnboundID UserResource and SCIMGroup.standardGroup, the UnboundID GroupResource, you can go to https://code.google.com/p/scimsdk/ and download the SDK which contains the Javadoc.
